description: Try our easy to follow Easter Nest Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Nest Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 540 g Betty CrockerTM Milk Chocolate Chunk Cookie Mix
400 g Betty CrockerTM Creamy DeluxeTM Vanilla Frosting

recipeInstructions.text: Top each cookie with a swirl of the frosting. Pile pink coconut onto half the cookies and green coconut onto the remaining cookies. Sit 3 mini chocolate eggs in the centre of each 'nest'. Store any leftover cookies in an airtight container in the fridge for 2-3 days.
